roleset.name: Add zest to

roles.note: This does not apply solely to food.

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class fill-9.8. No framenet class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example without arg 0
example.text: Cook for the longer time if the pasta is to be sauced and eaten immediately.

example.name: Example with both arg 1 and 2
example.text: Thin, tender ravioli was sauced in a delicate cream flecked with lemon zest.
example.arg: in a delicate cream flecked with lemon zest.

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example with all arguments
example.text: [Bare-breasted beauties *1] parade around the stage, wiggling, sighing, shaking, and [ * 1] saucing the house
